00155 inline void
00156 QtArgDefaultHelpPrinter::print() const
00157 {
00158     QTextStream stream( stdout );
00159 
00160     stream << m_programDescription << endl << endl;
00161     stream << QLatin1String( "USAGE: " ) << m_executableName
00162         << QLatin1Char( ' ' ) << m_usage << endl << endl;
00163     stream << m_help;

00166 inline void
00167 QtArgDefaultHelpPrinter::replaceMarkersInUsage()
00168 {
00169     m_usage.remove( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeFlags );
00170     m_usage.remove( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeNames );
00171     m_usage.remove( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeDescription );
00172     m_usage.remove( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::newLine );
00173 
00174     m_usage.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::afterFlags,
00175         QLatin1String( "," ) );
00176     m_usage.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::namesSeparator,
00177         QLatin1String( "," ) );
00178     m_usage.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::flagMarker,
00179         m_flagsMarker );
00180     m_usage.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::nameMarker,
00181         m_namesMarker );
00182     m_usage.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::argValue, m_argValue );
00183 }

00185 inline int
00186 QtArgDefaultHelpPrinter::calcMaxFlagsLength()
00187 {
00188     int maxLength = 0;
00189     int pos = 0;
00190 
00191     while( true )
00192     {
00193         const int beforeFlagsIdx =
00194             m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeFlags, pos );
00195 
00196         if( beforeFlagsIdx != -1 )
00197         {
00198             const int afterFlagsIdx =
00199                 m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::afterFlags,
00200                     beforeFlagsIdx );
00201 
00202             const int newLineIdx =
00203                 m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::newLine,
00204                     beforeFlagsIdx );
00205 
00206             int length = 0;
00207 
00208             if( afterFlagsIdx != -1 && newLineIdx > afterFlagsIdx )
00209             {
00210                 length = afterFlagsIdx - beforeFlagsIdx -
00211                     QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeFlags.length();
00212 
00213                 pos = afterFlagsIdx;
00214             }
00215             else
00216             {
00217                 const int beforeDescriptionIdx =
00218                     m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeDescription,
00219                         beforeFlagsIdx );
00220 
00221                 length = beforeDescriptionIdx - beforeFlagsIdx -
00222                     QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeFlags.length();
00223 
00224                 pos = beforeDescriptionIdx;
00225             }
00226 
00227             if( length > maxLength )
00228                 maxLength = length;
00229         }
00230         else
00231             break;
00232     }
00233 
00234     return maxLength;
00235 }

00237 inline int
00238 QtArgDefaultHelpPrinter::calcMaxNamesLength()
00239 {
00240     int maxLength = 0;
00241     int pos = 0;
00242 
00243     while( true )
00244     {
00245         int delta = 0;
00246         const int afterFlagsIdx = m_help.indexOf(
00247             QtArgHelpPrinterIface::afterFlags, pos );
00248         const int beforeNamesIdx = m_help.indexOf(
00249             QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeNames, pos );
00250 
00251         int startPos = 0;
00252 
00253         if( afterFlagsIdx != -1 && beforeNamesIdx != -1 )
00254         {
00255             if( afterFlagsIdx < beforeNamesIdx )
00256             {
00257                 startPos = afterFlagsIdx;
00258                 delta = QtArgHelpPrinterIface::afterFlags.length();
00259             }
00260             else
00261             {
00262                 startPos = beforeNamesIdx;
00263                 delta = QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeNames.length();
00264             }
00265         }
00266         else if( beforeNamesIdx != -1 )
00267         {
00268             startPos = beforeNamesIdx;
00269             delta = QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeNames.length();
00270         }
00271         else if( afterFlagsIdx != -1 )
00272         {
00273             startPos = afterFlagsIdx;
00274             delta = QtArgHelpPrinterIface::afterFlags.length();
00275         }
00276         else
00277             break;
00278 
00279         const int endPos =
00280             m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeDescription,
00281                 startPos );
00282 
00283         const int length = endPos - startPos - delta;
00284 
00285         if( length > maxLength )
00286             maxLength = length;
00287 
00288         pos = endPos;
00289     }
00290 
00291     return maxLength;
00292 }

00294 inline void
00295 QtArgDefaultHelpPrinter::replaceMarkersInHelp()
00296 {
00297     m_help.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::argValue, m_argValue );
00298     m_help.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::flagMarker, m_flagsMarker );
00299     m_help.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::nameMarker, m_namesMarker );
00300     m_help.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::namesSeparator, m_namesSeparator );
00301 
00302     const int beforeFlagsLength = 2;
00303     const int afterNamesLength = 3;
00304 
00305     const int beforeNamesLength = beforeFlagsLength +
00306         calcMaxFlagsLength() + 2;
00307     const int beforeDescLength = beforeNamesLength +
00308         calcMaxNamesLength() + afterNamesLength;
00309 
00310     while( true )
00311     {
00312         const int beforeFlagsIdx =
00313             m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeFlags );
00314         int afterFlagsIdx =
00315             m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::afterFlags );
00316         const int beforeNamesIdx =
00317             m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeNames );
00318         int beforeDescIdx =
00319             m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeDescription );
00320         int newLineIdx =
00321             m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::newLine );
00322 
00323         int flagsLength = 0;
00324 
00325         if( beforeFlagsIdx != -1 && beforeFlagsIdx < newLineIdx )
00326         {
00327             if( afterFlagsIdx != -1 && afterFlagsIdx < newLineIdx )
00328                 flagsLength = afterFlagsIdx - beforeFlagsIdx -
00329                     QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeFlags.length();
00330             else
00331                 flagsLength = beforeDescIdx - beforeFlagsIdx -
00332                     QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeFlags.length();
00333         }
00334 
00335         int namesLength = 0;
00336 
00337         if( afterFlagsIdx != -1 && afterFlagsIdx < newLineIdx )
00338             namesLength = beforeDescIdx - afterFlagsIdx -
00339                 QtArgHelpPrinterIface::afterFlags.length();
00340         else if( beforeNamesIdx != -1 && beforeNamesIdx < newLineIdx )
00341             namesLength = beforeDescIdx - beforeNamesIdx -
00342                 QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeNames.length();
00343 
00344         int beforeDescSpace = beforeDescLength;
00345 
00346         if( newLineIdx != -1 )
00347         {
00348             if( beforeFlagsIdx != -1 && beforeFlagsIdx < newLineIdx )
00349             {
00350                 m_help.replace( beforeFlagsIdx,
00351                     QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeFlags.length(),
00352                     QString( beforeFlagsLength, QLatin1Char( ' ' ) ) );
00353 
00354                 beforeDescSpace -= ( beforeFlagsLength + flagsLength );
00355 
00356                 if( afterFlagsIdx != -1 && afterFlagsIdx < newLineIdx )
00357                 {
00358                     afterFlagsIdx =
00359                         m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::afterFlags );
00360 
00361                     const int afterFlagsSpace = beforeNamesLength - 1 -
00362                         flagsLength - beforeFlagsLength;
00363 
00364                     beforeDescSpace -= ( afterFlagsSpace + 1 + namesLength );
00365 
00366                     m_help.replace( afterFlagsIdx,
00367                         QtArgHelpPrinterIface::afterFlags.length(),
00368                         QLatin1Char( ',' )
00369                             + QString( afterFlagsSpace, QLatin1Char( ' ' ) ) );
00370                 }
00371             }
00372             else if( beforeNamesIdx != -1 && beforeNamesIdx < newLineIdx )
00373             {
00374                 beforeDescSpace -= ( beforeNamesLength + namesLength );
00375 
00376                 m_help.replace( beforeNamesIdx,
00377                     QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeNames.length(),
00378                     QString( beforeNamesLength, QLatin1Char( ' ' ) ) );
00379             }
00380 
00381             beforeDescIdx =
00382                 m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeDescription );
00383 
00384             m_help.replace( beforeDescIdx,
00385                 QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeDescription.length(),
00386                 QString( beforeDescSpace, QLatin1Char( ' ' ) ) );
00387 
00388             newLineIdx = m_help.indexOf( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::newLine );
00389 
00390             m_help.replace( newLineIdx,
00391                 QtArgHelpPrinterIface::newLine.length(),
00392                 QLatin1String( "\n" ) );
00393         }
00394         else
00395             break;
00396     }
00397 }

00536 inline QString
00537 QtArgHelp::createUsageString()
00538 {
00539     QtArgCmdLineIface::QtArgumentsList requiredArgs;
00540     QtArgCmdLineIface::QtArgumentsList optionalArgs;
00541 
00542     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, m_cmdLine->arguments() )
00543     {
00544         if( arg->isRequired() )
00545             requiredArgs.push_back( arg );
00546         else
00547             optionalArgs.push_back( arg );
00548     }
00549 
00550     QString usage;
00551 
00552     createUsageStringForArgs( usage, requiredArgs, QChar::Null, QChar::Null );
00553     createUsageStringForArgs( usage, optionalArgs,
00554         QLatin1Char( '[' ), QLatin1Char( ']' ) );
00555 
00556     return usage;
00557 }
00558 
00559 inline void
00560 QtArgHelp::createUsageStringForArgs( QString & usage,
00561     const QtArgCmdLineIface::QtArgumentsList & args,
00562     const QChar & before, const QChar & after )
00563 {
00564     int count = 1;
00565 
00566     if( usage.length() )
00567         usage.append( QLatin1Char( ' ' ) );
00568 
00569     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, args )
00570     {
00571         if( !before.isNull() )
00572             usage.append( before );
00573 
00574         usage.append( arg->getUsageString( m_names ) );
00575 
00576         if( !after.isNull() )
00577             usage.append( after );
00578 
00579         if( count < args.size() )
00580             usage.append( QLatin1Char( ' ' ) );
00581     }
00582 }
00583 
00584 inline QString
00585 QtArgHelp::createHelpString()
00586 {
00587     QtArgCmdLineIface::QtArgumentsList requiredArgs;
00588     QtArgCmdLineIface::QtArgumentsList optionalArgs;
00589 
00590     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, m_cmdLine->arguments() )
00591     {
00592         if( arg->isRequired() )
00593             requiredArgs.push_back( arg );
00594         else
00595             optionalArgs.push_back( arg );
00596     }
00597 
00598     QString help;
00599 
00600     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, requiredArgs )
00601         help.append( arg->getHelpString( m_names ) );
00602 
00603     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, optionalArgs )
00604         help.append( arg->getHelpString( m_names ) );
00605 
00606     return help;
00607 }

00609 inline void
00610 QtArgHelp::removeMarkersFromUsageString( QString & usage )
00611 {
00612     usage.remove( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeFlags );
00613     usage.remove( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeNames );
00614     usage.remove( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::beforeDescription );
00615     usage.remove( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::newLine );
00616 
00617     usage.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::afterFlags,
00618         QLatin1String( ", " ) );
00619     usage.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::namesSeparator,
00620         QLatin1String( ", " ) );
00621     usage.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::flagMarker,
00622         m_cmdLine->delimiter() );
00623     usage.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::nameMarker,
00624         QString( 2, m_cmdLine->delimiter() ) );
00625     usage.replace( QtArgHelpPrinterIface::argValue,
00626         QLatin1String( " <arg>" ) );
00627 }
00628 
00629 inline void
00630 QtArgHelp::printHelp( QtArgIface * arg )
00631 {
00632     QTextStream out( stdout );
00633 
00634     QString usage = arg->getUsageString( m_names );
00635     removeMarkersFromUsageString( usage );
00636 
00637     out << endl << QLatin1String( "USAGE: " ) << usage << endl << endl
00638         << QLatin1String( "DESCRIPTION: " );
00639 
00640     if( arg->longDescription().length() )
00641         out << arg->longDescription();
00642     else
00643         out << arg->description();
00644 
00645     out << endl;
00646 
00647     throw QtArgHelpHasPrintedEx();
00648 }
00649 
00650 inline void
00651 QtArgHelp::printHelp( const QString & argName )
00652 {
00653     if( argName.length() )
00654     {
00655         try {
00656             printHelp( m_cmdLine->findArgument( argName ) );
00657         }
00658         catch( const QtArgUnknownArgumentEx & )
00659         {
00660             QTextStream out( stdout );
00661 
00662             out << QString::fromLatin1( "Unknown argument: %1%1%2" )
00663                 .arg( m_cmdLine->delimiter() )
00664                 .arg( argName );
00665 
00666             throw QtArgHelpHasPrintedEx();
00667         }
00668     }
00669     else
00670     {
00671         QTextStream out( stdout );
00672 
00673         out << QLatin1String( "Empty argument name." );
00674 
00675         throw QtArgHelpHasPrintedEx();
00676     }
00677 }
00678 
00679 inline void
00680 QtArgHelp::visit( QtArgCmdLineContext & context )
00681 {
00682     initNames( m_cmdLine->arguments() );
00683 
00684     if( !context.atEnd() )
00685     {
00686         QString argName = context.next();
00687 
00688         if( m_cmdLine->isArgument( argName ) )
00689         {
00690             argName.replace( 0, 2, QLatin1String( "" ) );
00691 
00692             printHelp( argName );
00693         }
00694         else if( m_cmdLine->isFlag( argName ) )
00695         {
00696             QTextStream out( stdout );
00697             argName.replace( 0, 1, QLatin1String( "" ) );
00698 
00699             if( argName.length() )
00700             {
00701                 try {
00702                     QtArgIface * arg = m_cmdLine->findArgument( argName[ 0 ] );
00703 
00704                     foreach( QChar f, argName )
00705                     {
00706                         if( arg != m_cmdLine->findArgument( f ) )
00707                             throw QtArgUnknownArgumentEx( QString() );
00708                     }
00709 
00710                     printHelp( arg );
00711                 }
00712                 catch( const QtArgUnknownArgumentEx & )
00713                 {
00714                     out << QString::fromLatin1( "Unknown argument: %1%2" )
00715                         .arg( m_cmdLine->delimiter() )
00716                         .arg( argName );
00717 
00718                     throw QtArgHelpHasPrintedEx();
00719                 }
00720             }
00721             else
00722             {
00723                 out << QLatin1String( "Empty flag." );
00724 
00725                 throw QtArgHelpHasPrintedEx();
00726             }
00727         }
00728         else
00729             printHelp( argName );
00730     }
00731     else
00732     {
00733         m_printer->setDelimiterChar( m_cmdLine->delimiter() );
00734         m_printer->setUsageString( createUsageString() );
00735         m_printer->setHelpString( createHelpString() );
00736 
00737         m_printer->print();
00738     }
00739 
00740     throw QtArgHelpHasPrintedEx();
00741 }
00742 
00743 inline void
00744 QtArgHelp::initNames( const QtArgCmdLineIface::QtArgumentsList & list )
00745 {
00746     foreach( QtArgIface * arg, list )
00747     {
00748         if( arg->arguments().size() > 1 )
00749             initNames( arg->arguments() );
00750         else
00751             m_names.append( arg->names() );
00752     }
00753 }
